description:
A versatile tube that can be worn as a headband, mask, balaclava, beanie or neck warmer. The seamlessly knit tube is made from recycled PET bottles and is fully reflective to help you be seen in dark or low-light situations.Breathable and quick-drying Repreve® recycled microfibre made from plastic bottles. Each Buff contains 2 recycled plastic bottles!Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.360 degree reflectivity keeps you visible in low-light conditions.Dimensions are 53 x 22.3cm.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Buff Reflective Original Multifunctional Headwear - Unisex
